snippet: A federal judge on Thursday upheld a Washington gun law that bans assault weapons and requires owners of other firearms to follow certain registration requirements.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge James Boasberg upholds Washington gun law that bans assault weapons and requires owners of other firearms to follow certain registration requirements, including that they pass test and safety course.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday upheld a Washington gun law that bans assault weapons and requires owners of other firearms to follow certain registration requirements.

headline.main: Judge Upholds Ban an Assault Weapons
headline.print_headline: Judge Upholds Ban on Assault Weapons
